summary: Nivalon sword, a craftable sword with the same stats as a glass sword.
descriptionHtml:
This provides a crafteable sword I randomly dabbed Nivalon. It requires 2 Orichalcum ingots, 2 Steel ingots and some leather strips. It\'s \'only\' as powerful as a glass word, for the simple reason you can pretty much craft it at any skill level.

[b]Versions:[/b]
Note that there are 3 versions. 
1: uncompressed 4096 version (unzipped ~380mb)
2: compressed 4096 version (unzipped ~14mb)
3: compressed 1024 version for those that rather prefer the Skyrim HD style. (unzipped <1mb) 
Take the last one if your game struggles too much with the size of the texture.

[b]Installation:[/b]
[url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/How_to_install_Skyrim_mods]How to install Skyrim Mods[/url]
Use the manual instruction if you don\'t use NMM or this file doesn\'t work with it. (I don\'t use NMM personally, if you can confirm it works...drop a comment!)

[b]Creation:[/b]
Lexx666 created the textures and AlonsoMartinez created the model. I fixed and modified the UV, textures and the model to make them appropriate for Skyrim standards.

[b]Problems and bugs:[/b]
Place a comment if you encounter any issues.

[b]BSA file format:[/b]
As BSA load faster than loose files, are smaller and provide a better experience, I will not provide an extracted version of the files. If you dislike them however, [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/Skyrim_BSA_Extraction]follow this tutorial[/url] to extract the files.

[b]Modders Resource/Permissions[/b]
It\'s a resource but you need permission in some cases, check the permissions button at \"Actions\".

[b]Direct questions:[/b]
I have been on nexus for 7+ years and I\'m not planning on leaving, so just contact me via PM if I don\'t reply fast enough on comments.
author: AlonsoMartinez Lexx666 Pronam
